title: Sherlock Holmes: Game of Shadows (2011) 1080p iTunes
description:
Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows (2011) 129 min 

DESCRIPTION:
Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson join forces with a Gypsy woman and Holmes' brother to outwit their fiercest adversary, Professor Moriarty.

SPECS IN BRIEF:
M4V file for iTunes/iDevices
V: 1920x800 23.98 fps h.264 @ 4600 Kbps
A: 160 Kbps 2.0 AAC & 384 Kbps 5.1 AC-3
S: English & English SDH / subs for non-English dialogue burned into source print

SOURCE:
Sherlock.Holmes.A.Game.Of.Shadows.2011.1080p.BluRay.x264-RSG

PLAYBACK:
Encoded & tagged for iTunes and Apple devices that can handle *1080p HD* video. Playback is confirmed for:
  1. 2012 iPad
  2. 2012 AppleTV
  3. 2011 iPad 2 (with 5.1 software or later)
  4. 2011 iPhone 4S
  5. 2010 AppleTV (with 5.0 software; will output file as 720p)
  6. Mixed reports for 2010 iPad 1 (with 5.1 software or later)
